name: The Dinner Table
description:
The game is set around a dinner party with old friends and rising tensions. The way you respond to conversation changes people's mood around the table.

Tensions rise as secrets are uncovered and treacherous intentions revealed. Can you bring the conversation to its natural end?

This game was made in collaboration with Toni Brasting, inspired by Ivo Consi's short film, Feeders. It was made during the MA Digital Games: Theory and Design at Brunel University.
